name: ALONE in EMIRATES NEW PREMIUM ECONOMY *First inflight review on YouTube*
description:
Business class in Economy?

Is the new Emirates Premium Economy really that good? Well today Iâ€™m going to try it out inflight - for the first time on YouTube. The most challenging part for this was actually to ensure I could get on the right plane. In fact there is only one Emirates A380 which has the new premium economy installed and only route which this is operated on. 

Thankfully it runs on the London - Dubai route, and being based out of the UK it's ideal.
